    public class CertificateSigningTool
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

        private boolean validateInputs()

      • createRequest

        private org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest createRequest(java.security.KeyPair kp)
                                                                throws org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException,
                                                                       java.io.IOException
        Creates a PKCS10CertificationRequest with the given user inputs.
        Parameters:
        kp - The key pair of the requesting instance.
        Returns:
        The created certification request.
        Throws:
        org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException - If an exception occurs during the generation of the request.
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
